Package org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.xviewer.edit

Class XViewerMultiEditAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.xviewer.edit.XViewerEditAdapter
      • org.eclipse.nebula.widgets.xviewer.edit.XViewerMultiEditAdapter

  • public class XViewerMultiEditAdapter
extends XViewerEditAdapter
    simple multi edit adapter
    - Converter.getInput() gives you the current selection in the selObject (first object is the clicked one)
